Our Solutions to Your Needs

Maisa text post

Dec 2012

Tags are used for the logic in your template. New tags are very easy to code, so I hope to get many contributions to the standard tag library after releasing this code. Here is a list of currently supported tags: assign - Assigns some value to a variable capture - Block tag that captures text into a variable case - Block tag, its the standard case…when block comment - Block tag, comments out the text in the block cycle - Cycle is usually used within a loop to alternate between values, like colors or DOM classes. for - For loop if - Standard if/else block include - Includes another template; useful for partials raw - temporarily disable tag processing to avoid syntax conflicts. unless - Mirror of if statement
